translated: If that is so, it is just a conception.

original: 'di la brjod pa /
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa /
translated: In response to this, it is said:

original: gal te 'dod dang mi 'dod par //
analyzed: gal te 'dod dang mi 'dod par //
translated: If it is held that the appearance

original: snang ba rtog yin don blo min //
analyzed: snang ba rtog yin don blo min //
translated: As desirable or undesirable is conceptual, not a cognition of an object,

original: de la'ang 'chi ltas la sogs par //üîΩmtshams sbyor med sems mthong ba yin //
analyzed: de la'ang 'chi ltas la sogs par // mtshams sbyor med sems mthong ba yin //
translated: Then even in that case, the appearanceüîΩOf the signs of death and so on would be a nonassociated compositional factor.

original: 'chi ltas kyis zin pa rnams la don blo yang rnam pa gzhan du mthong ba yin no /
analyzed: 'chi ltas kyis zin pa rnams la don blo yang rnam pa gzhan du mthong ba yin no /
translated: For those who are seized by the signs of death, the cognition of the object also appears in another way.

original: de'i phyir de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ni ma yin te /
translated: Therefore that is not so.

original: de'i phyir phyi rol gzhal bya la'ang //
analyzed: de'i phyir phyi rol gzhal bya la'ang //
translated: Therefore, even in the case of external objects,

original: rang nyid nyams myong 'bras yin rig / gang phyir ji ltar 'di rang bzhin //
analyzed: rang nyid nyams myong 'bras yin rig / gang phyir ji ltar 'di rang bzhin //
translated: One should know that the result is the experience of itself,

original: de ltar don ni rnam nges des //
analyzed: de ltar don ni rnam nges des //
translated: Because the nature of this is just as it is.

original: de'i phyir phyi'i don la yang rang rig pa nyid 'bras bu yin gyi don rig pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir phyi'i don la yang rang rig pa nyid 'bras bu yin gyi don rig pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, even in the case of external objects, the result is reflexive awareness and not the awareness of an object,

original: de rig pa 'am rjes su ma zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de rig pa 'am rjes su ma zhugs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not engaged in the awareness of that.

original: 'bras bu 'di la yang tshad ma ni don gyi rnam pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: 'bras bu 'di la yang tshad ma ni don gyi rnam pa nyid yin te /
translated: And in this case, the valid knowledge is the aspect of the object itself.

original: ji skad du slob dpon gyis gang gi tshe phyi rol nyid gzhal bya yin pa de'i tshe ni yul du snang ba nyid 'di'i tshad ma yin no zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: ji skad du slob dpon gyis gang gi tshe phyi rol nyid gzhal bya yin pa de'i tshe ni yul du snang ba nyid 'di'i tshad ma yin no zhes gsungs so //
translated: As the Acarya has said, ‚ÄúWhen the external object is the object to be evaluated, then the appearance as the object is the valid cognition.‚Äù

original: 'di ltar shes pa rang rig par bya ba yin yang rang gi ngo bo la ma ltos par don du snang ba nyid 'di'i tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di ltar shes pa rang rig par bya ba yin yang rang gi ngo bo la ma ltos par don du snang ba nyid 'di'i tshad ma yin no //
translated: In this way, although consciousness is to be known by itself, the appearance as the object is the valid cognition, without depending on its own nature.

original: gang gi phyir don de ni des gzhal bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir don de ni des gzhal bar bya ba yin no //
translated: Because that object is to be evaluated by it.

original: ji ltar don gyi rnam pa sdug gu la sogs par snang ba la gnas pa de'i rang bzhin du yul de rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: ji ltar don gyi rnam pa sdug gu la sogs par snang ba la gnas pa de'i rang bzhin du yul de rtogs par byed do //
translated: Just as the object appears in the aspect of the beautiful, etc., it is understood as the nature of that.

original: tshad ma'i rnam pa tha dad pa ji snyed pa gzhal bya la nye bar 'dogs pa yin no //
analyzed: tshad ma'i rnam pa tha dad pa ji snyed pa gzhal bya la nye bar 'dogs pa yin no //
translated: The various aspects of valid cognition are imputed to the object to be evaluated.

original: gal te tha dad pa med pa'i phyir 'dzin pa'i rnam pa yang ci'i phyir tshad ma ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te tha dad pa med pa'i phyir 'dzin pa'i rnam pa yang ci'i phyir tshad ma ma yin zhe na /
translated: If it is asked why the aspect of apprehension is not valid cognition, because it is not different,

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: here it is said:

original: de tshe don snang 'di nyid ni //
analyzed: de tshe don snang 'di nyid ni //
translated: At that time, this very appearance of the objectüîΩis valid cognition.

original: tshad yin yod du zin kyang ni //
analyzed: tshad yin yod du zin kyang ni //
translated: Even if it exists,

original: don gzhan min phyir phyi rol la //
analyzed: don gzhan min phyir phyi rol la //
translated: Because it is not a different object,

original: 'dzin bdag ltos par bya ba min //
analyzed: 'dzin bdag ltos par bya ba min //
translated: the self that apprehends it does not depend on it.

original: ci'i phyir don de dang rjes su mthun par 'jog pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ci'i phyir don de dang rjes su mthun par 'jog pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Why is it not posited in accordance with the object?

original: don gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not a different object.

original: rnam pa med par rang rig pa ni don gzhan du rnam par 'jog pa ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam pa med par rang rig pa ni don gzhan du rnam par 'jog pa ma yin te /
translated: The self-awareness that lacks an aspect is not posited as a different object,

original: kun la mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun la mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the same for all.

original: @61a * // gang phyir ji ltar don bdag ste //üîΩshes la gnas pa de lta bur //
analyzed: @61a * // gang phyir ji ltar don bdag ste // shes la gnas pa de lta bur //
translated: Because the object is the self of the consciousness,üîΩit is posited in that way.

original: 'di ni de ltar gnas so zhes //
analyzed: 'di ni de ltar gnas so zhes //
translated: It is ascertained that it exists in that wayüîΩbecause of the power of the aspect.

original: nges 'byed / rnam pa'i dbang gis don la de ltar sngon po la sogs pa rang gi rnam par gnas pa yin no zhes rtogs so //
analyzed: nges 'byed / rnam pa'i dbang gis don la de ltar sngon po la sogs pa rang gi rnam par gnas pa yin no zhes rtogs so //
translated: The object exists in that way, as blue, etc., because of the existence of the aspect.

original: des na don du rtogs pa'i rgyu ni rnam pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: des na don du rtogs pa'i rgyu ni rnam pa nyid yin no //
translated: Therefore the cause of the understanding of the object is the aspect itself.

original: des na de nyid tshad ma yin no //
analyzed: des na de nyid tshad ma yin no //
translated: Therefore that is the valid knowledge.

original: de lta na ni 'o na don rig pa nyid 'bras bu yin pas da rang rig pas ci bya zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na don rig pa nyid 'bras bu yin pas da rang rig pas ci bya zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then since the awareness of the object itself is the effect, what is the use of self-awareness?

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: 'di ltar don du rtog pa de ni bdag rig pa dang rjes su mthun pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'di ltar don du rtog pa de ni bdag rig pa dang rjes su mthun pa nyid do //
translated: Thus, this conception of the object is in accord with self-awareness.

original: de nyid bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid bshad pa ni /
translated: This is explained:

original: bdag nyid rig pa yin /
analyzed: bdag nyid rig pa yin /
translated: It is self-awareness.

original: de'i phyir de nyid don rig 'dod //üîΩ'di ltar don bdag snang ma yin //
analyzed: de'i phyir de nyid don rig 'dod // 'di ltar don bdag snang ma yin //
translated: Therefore, it is accepted as the awareness of the object.üîΩBecause the object does not appear,

original: gang gi phyir mi snang ba ni mngon sum gyis gzhal bya ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir mi snang ba ni mngon sum gyis gzhal bya ma yin no //
translated: what does not appear is not an object of direct perception.

original: ji ltar lkog tu gyur pa'i don la mngon sum 'jug / mngon sum gyi 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa'i skabs yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar lkog tu gyur pa'i don la mngon sum 'jug / mngon sum gyi 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa'i skabs yin no //
translated: How can direct perception engage an object that is hidden? This is the context for establishing the result of direct perception.

original: de'i phyir rang gi ngo bo mngon sum yin pa'i phyir dang / gzhan rig pa med pa'i phyir rang rig pa 'bras bu yin no //üîΩde yi sgrub byed blo la ni //
analyzed: de'i phyir rang gi ngo bo mngon sum yin pa'i phyir dang / gzhan rig pa med pa'i phyir rang rig pa 'bras bu yin no // de yi sgrub byed blo la ni //
translated: Therefore, because its own nature is direct perception and because there is no awareness of another, self-awareness is the result.üîΩThe proof of that is as follows:üîΩThe object that is the basis of that

original: gnas don de yi bya ba de //
analyzed: gnas don de yi bya ba de //
translated: is the activity of that.

original: gang phyir ji ltar don de ni //
analyzed: gang phyir ji ltar don de ni //
translated: Because the object is

original: gnas pa de ltar de rab gsal //
analyzed: gnas pa de ltar de rab gsal //
translated: as it is, it is clearly that.

original: don 'jog de yi bdag nyid phyir //
analyzed: don 'jog de yi bdag nyid phyir //
translated: Because the object is posited as its nature,

original: rang rig yin yang don rig 'dod //
analyzed: rang rig yin yang don rig 'dod //
translated: even though it is self-awareness, it is accepted as the awareness of the object.

original: de'i sgrub par byed pa ni blo la gnas pa'i don nyid yin no //üîΩde'i bya ba ni de yin te /
analyzed: de'i sgrub par byed pa ni blo la gnas pa'i don nyid yin no // de'i bya ba ni de yin te /
translated: The proof of that is the object that exists in the mind.üîΩThat is its function.

original: des de byed pa yin no //
analyzed: des de byed pa yin no //
translated: It is that which performs that.

original: des na de de'i 'bras bu yin te /
analyzed: des na de de'i 'bras bu yin te /
translated: Therefore, that is its result.

original: de de'i rang bzhin du gsal ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de de'i rang bzhin du gsal ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is clear that that is its nature.

original: de lta na 'o na rnam pa tshad ma ni phyi'i don yin la /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na rnam pa tshad ma ni phyi'i don yin la /
translated: In that case, the aspect is a valid cognition that is an external object.

original: 'bras bu rang rig pa ni rang gi ngo bo la 'jug pa'i phyir yul tha dad do zhe na /
analyzed: 'bras bu rang rig pa ni rang gi ngo bo la 'jug pa'i phyir yul tha dad do zhe na /
translated: The result, self-awareness, is engaged in its own nature, so the object is different.üîΩThat is not so.

original: de ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni ma yin te /
translated: Thus:

original: 'di ltar / don 'jog de yi bdag nyid phyir ;üîΩ/ rang rig yin yang don rig 'dod //
analyzed: 'di ltar / don 'jog de yi bdag nyid phyir ; / rang rig yin yang don rig 'dod //
translated: Because it is the nature of the positing of the object,üîΩit is self-awareness, but it is asserted to be awareness of the object.

original: 'di don dam par ni rang rig pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: 'di don dam par ni rang rig pa nyid yin la /
translated: In the ultimate, it is self-awareness.

original: tha snyad du ni don rig pa yin no //
analyzed: tha snyad du ni don rig pa yin no //
translated: In the conventional, it is awareness of the object.

original: des ni tha snyad du ltos te /
analyzed: des ni tha snyad du ltos te /
translated: In the conventional, it is dependent.

original: don nyid la 'bras bu yin la tshad ma yang don nyid la yin pa'i phyir yul tha dad par ga las 'gyur /
analyzed: don nyid la 'bras bu yin la tshad ma yang don nyid la yin pa'i phyir yul tha dad par ga las 'gyur /
translated: Because the object itself is the result and the valid cognition is the object itself, how could the object be different?

original: don dam pa la ltos na yang gnyi ga yang rang gi ngo bo la yang yin te /
analyzed: don dam pa la ltos na yang gnyi ga yang rang gi ngo bo la yang yin te /
translated: Even in dependence on the ultimate, both are in their own nature.

original: de lta na yang ga las yin /
analyzed: de lta na yang ga las yin /
translated: In that case, what is it?

original: de nyid bshad pa ni /
analyzed: de nyid bshad pa ni /
translated: That is explained:

original: de'i phyir yul tha dad pa 'ang min //
analyzed: de'i phyir yul tha dad pa 'ang min //
translated: Therefore, it is not a different object.

original: 'o na phyi rol gyi don gzhal bar bya ba la ci'i phyir rang rig pa 'bras bur bshad ce na /
analyzed: 'o na phyi rol gyi don gzhal bar bya ba la ci'i phyir rang rig pa 'bras bur bshad ce na /
translated: If external objects are to be cognized, why is reflexive awareness explained to be the result?üîΩIt is explained:

original: bshad pa / rang gi ngo bos dpyod pa na //
analyzed: bshad pa / rang gi ngo bos dpyod pa na //
translated: When analyzed by way of its own nature,

original: rang rig 'bras bu yin par bshad //
analyzed: rang rig 'bras bu yin par bshad //
translated: reflexive awareness is explained to be the result.

original: don rig de'i bdag @61b nyid phyir ro //
analyzed: don rig de'i bdag @61b nyid phyir ro //
translated: Because it is the nature of the cognition of the object.

original: don dam pa la ltos nas 'di'i don rig pa yin yang rang rig pa nyid do //
analyzed: don dam pa la ltos nas 'di'i don rig pa yin yang rang rig pa nyid do //
translated: Although in dependence on the ultimate it is the cognition of the object, it is reflexive awareness.

original: rig pa'i rang gi ngo bo ma dpyad pa na de don rig pa yin yang nges par dpyad pa ni rang rig pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: rig pa'i rang gi ngo bo ma dpyad pa na de don rig pa yin yang nges par dpyad pa ni rang rig pa nyid yin no //
translated: When the nature of cognition is not analyzed, although it is the cognition of the object, when it is ascertained and analyzed, it is reflexive awareness.

original: gal te don rang gi ngo bos mi snang gi shes pa nyid rang gi rang bzhin du snang ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te don rang gi ngo bos mi snang gi shes pa nyid rang gi rang bzhin du snang ba yin na /
translated: If the object does not appear by way of its own nature but cognition itself appears as its own nature,

original: ji ltar don gzhal bya yin /
analyzed: ji ltar don gzhal bya yin /
translated: how is the object cognized?

original: don de dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: don de dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because it is similar to the object.

original: de 'dra'o zhes ji ltar shes /
analyzed: de 'dra'o zhes ji ltar shes /
translated: How do you know that it is similar?

original: rnam par rig pa rnam pa du ma can yin no zhes kyang bshad pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par rig pa rnam pa du ma can yin no zhes kyang bshad pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But it is also explained that consciousness has many aspects.

original: 'dir brjod pa /
analyzed: 'dir brjod pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: de dang 'dra ba 'am gzhan 'dra 'ang rung //
analyzed: de dang 'dra ba 'am gzhan 'dra 'ang rung //
translated: Whether it is similar to that or not,

original: shes pa de ltar snang ba yi //
analyzed: shes pa de ltar snang ba yi //
translated: that consciousness appears in that way.

original: rgyu yi don yang snang bas na //
analyzed: rgyu yi don yang snang bas na //
translated: Because the object appears as the cause,

original: don ni gzhal bya nyid du 'dod //
analyzed: don ni gzhal bya nyid du 'dod //
translated: the object is asserted to be the object of comprehension.

original: gal te yang chu med pa nyid du chur snang ba'i rnam par shes pa skye ba de lta na yang smig rgyu la brten nas skye ba yin pa de'i phyir ci zhig ltar don ni rgyu la brten nas skye bas don la dmigs par brjod do //
analyzed: gal te yang chu med pa nyid du chur snang ba'i rnam par shes pa skye ba de lta na yang smig rgyu la brten nas skye ba yin pa de'i phyir ci zhig ltar don ni rgyu la brten nas skye bas don la dmigs par brjod do //
translated: Even if the consciousness that appears as water arises in the absence of water, it arises in dependence on a mirage. Therefore, in some way, since the object arises in dependence on a cause, it is said that the object is observed.

original: gal te rgyu nyid las dmigs pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te rgyu nyid las dmigs pa yin na /
translated: If the object is observed from the cause itself,

original: bag chags kyi rgyu can nyid du 'thad pa ma yin nam /
analyzed: bag chags kyi rgyu can nyid du 'thad pa ma yin nam /
translated: is it not tenable that it is the cause of latent predispositions?

original: de ni rgyu ma yin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni rgyu ma yin pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not the cause,

original: bag chags ni rnam pa de skyed pa la nus pa mthong ba'i nges pa yin no //
analyzed: bag chags ni rnam pa de skyed pa la nus pa mthong ba'i nges pa yin no //
translated: because latent predispositions are ascertained to be the power that produces that aspect.

original: de ltar yang khyed kyis sgrub pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yang khyed kyis sgrub pa yin no //
translated: In that case, you also prove that.

original: gal te de lta bu'i don med par rnam pa de mi 'byung ba yin na /
analyzed: gal te de lta bu'i don med par rnam pa de mi 'byung ba yin na /
translated: If the aspect does not occur without such an object,

original: don rig par 'thad pa yin no //
analyzed: don rig par 'thad pa yin no //
translated: then it is reasonable that it perceives the object.

original: de lta ma yin na /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na /
translated: If it were not so,

original: ji ltar rnam pa 'ga' zhig ltar //
analyzed: ji ltar rnam pa 'ga' zhig ltar //
translated: then like some aspects,

original: don dngos med pa snang can te //
analyzed: don dngos med pa snang can te //
translated: it would be a perception without an actual object.

original: ji ltar don 'dzin ce na bden //
analyzed: ji ltar don 'dzin ce na bden //
translated: How could it be said to apprehend an object?

original: de 'dra ngas kyang mi shes so //
analyzed: de 'dra ngas kyang mi shes so //
translated: I do not know such a thing.

original: gang gi tshe don nye bar gnas pa med pa'i yang de'i rnam pa yin pa de'i tshe na re zhig de don 'dzin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi tshe don nye bar gnas pa med pa'i yang de'i rnam pa yin pa de'i tshe na re zhig de don 'dzin pa ma yin no //
translated: When the aspect is of that object, but the object is not present, then it does not apprehend the object.

original: yul gzhan du mthong ba 'dzin pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: yul gzhan du mthong ba 'dzin pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it apprehends the object in another place,

original: gal te de'i tshe yul gzhan yang med na ji ltar snang /
analyzed: gal te de'i tshe yul gzhan yang med na ji ltar snang /
translated: then if the object does not exist in that place, how does it appear?

original: gang na yod pa der snang ngo zhe na /
analyzed: gang na yod pa der snang ngo zhe na /
translated: If you say that it appears where it exists,

original: gal te gang na yang med na thabs ci yod /
analyzed: gal te gang na yang med na thabs ci yod /
translated: then if it does not exist anywhere, what can be done?

original: gdon mi za bar 'ga' zhig na yod par ni snang ba nyid las shes te /
analyzed: gdon mi za bar 'ga' zhig na yod par ni snang ba nyid las shes te /
translated: Undoubtedly, it is known that it appears somewhere,üîΩbecause if the object does not exist, the appearance is not seen.

original: don med na snang ba ma mthong ba'i phyir 'brel pa las de ltar rtogs so zhe na /
analyzed: don med na snang ba ma mthong ba'i phyir 'brel pa las de ltar rtogs so zhe na /
translated: We understand it in this way from the connection.

original: de lta na 'o na ma mthong ba de ji ltar snang /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na ma mthong ba de ji ltar snang /
translated: But if that is so, then how could that which is not seen appear?

original: de yang skye ba gzhan la sogs par mthong ngo zhe na /
analyzed: de yang skye ba gzhan la sogs par mthong ngo zhe na /
translated: And if it is said that it is seen in another life and so on,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so.

original: nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nges pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no certainty.

original: ma mthong ba'i yang snang bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: ma mthong ba'i yang snang bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If it is said that that which is not seen also appears,

original: de lta na 'o na /üîΩyul la sogs pa gzhan du ni //
analyzed: de lta na 'o na / yul la sogs pa gzhan du ni //
translated: then in that case,üîΩeven though not seen in another place and so on,

original: ma mthong bar yang don du ni //
analyzed: ma mthong bar yang don du ni //
translated: the object would appear.

original: snang na thams cad de yi tshe //
analyzed: snang na thams cad de yi tshe //
translated: And at that time,

original: thams cad thams cad rig par thal //
analyzed: thams cad thams cad rig par thal //
translated: it follows that everything would know everything.

original: @62a * // ma mthong yang yul la sogs pa gzhan na gnas pa snang na thams cad rig par thal lo //
analyzed: @62a * // ma mthong yang yul la sogs pa gzhan na gnas pa snang na thams cad rig par thal lo //
translated: If that which is not seen appears in another place and so on, it follows that everything would know everything.

original: gnas skabs kyi khyad par med par snang ba ma yin te /üîΩrab rib la sogs pas snang ba yin no zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: gnas skabs kyi khyad par med par snang ba ma yin te / rab rib la sogs pas snang ba yin no zhe na ma yin te /
translated: It is not that it appears without a difference in state,üîΩbecause it appears due to cataracts and so on.

original: rab rib thams cad la thun mong ba yin pa'i phyir thams cad snang bar thal lo //
analyzed: rab rib thams cad la thun mong ba yin pa'i phyir thams cad snang bar thal lo //
translated: That is not so, because it follows that everything would appear due to cataracts being common to all.

original: gzhan yang / rab rib mthong ba nyams par byed pa de nyid mthong ba'i rgyu yin la mthong ba'i rgyu yin pas thams cad mthong bar thal lo //
analyzed: gzhan yang / rab rib mthong ba nyams par byed pa de nyid mthong ba'i rgyu yin la mthong ba'i rgyu yin pas thams cad mthong bar thal lo //
translated: Moreover, the cause of the vision of the diseased eye is the cause of the vision of the nondiseased eye, and therefore it follows that everything would be seen.

original: gang snang ba de nyid kyis mthong ba skyed do zhe na /
analyzed: gang snang ba de nyid kyis mthong ba skyed do zhe na /
translated: If you say that the very thing that appears generates the vision,

original: 'o na ma mthong ba nyid snang bas med pa de nyid kyis mthong bar skyed par 'gyur ro ;
analyzed: 'o na ma mthong ba nyid snang bas med pa de nyid kyis mthong bar skyed par 'gyur ro ;
translated: then the very nonvision that appears would generate vision.

original: / don med pa'i mthong ba ni snang ba med do zhe na /
analyzed: / don med pa'i mthong ba ni snang ba med do zhe na /
translated: If you say that the vision of the nonexistent does not appear,

original: rung ba'i yul gyi gnas skabs med par yang snang ba med do //
analyzed: rung ba'i yul gyi gnas skabs med par yang snang ba med do //
translated: then the vision of the nonexistent would not appear even in the absence of the occasion of the existent object.

original: de nyid kyis ma nges so zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid kyis ma nges so zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is not ascertained in that way,

original: gnyi ga la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: gnyi ga la yang mtshungs so //
translated: then it is the same for both.

original: de nyid don yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de nyid don yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the very thing that is the object is the object,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: that is not so,

original: don nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the object itself does not exist.

original: de lta bur gyur pa nyid don yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa nyid don yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the very thing that is so is the object,

original: thams cad de ltar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad de ltar 'gyur ro //
translated: then everything would be so.

original: 'jig rten pa ma yin pa nyid na thams cad 'jig rten pa ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'jig rten pa ma yin pa nyid na thams cad 'jig rten pa ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: If it is not of the world, then everything is not of the world.

original: mthong ba las ma gtogs pa'i khyad par gzhan ni med do zhes bstan zin to //
analyzed: mthong ba las ma gtogs pa'i khyad par gzhan ni med do zhes bstan zin to //
translated: It has already been explained that there is no difference between them except that one is seen and the other is not.

original: thob pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: thob pa'o zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is obtained,

original: de yang mthong ba nyid do //
analyzed: de yang mthong ba nyid do //
translated: then that is just seeing.

original: gzhan gyis mthong ba la sogs pa yang bshad zin to //
analyzed: gzhan gyis mthong ba la sogs pa yang bshad zin to //
translated: It has already been explained that seeing by another and so on are also untenable.

original: ji ltar dang po'i shes pa de //üîΩthob pa la ni ltos pa bzhin //üîΩde thob pa yang thob pa la //
analyzed: ji ltar dang po'i shes pa de // thob pa la ni ltos pa bzhin // de thob pa yang thob pa la //
translated: Just as the first cognitionüîΩdepends on the obtainment of that,üîΩthe obtainment of that also

original: ltos phyir thug pa med par 'gyur //üîΩgal te 'ga' zhig rang nyid las //
analyzed: ltos phyir thug pa med par 'gyur // gal te 'ga' zhig rang nyid las //
translated: depends on the obtainment of that.üîΩIf you assert that the obtainment of something

original: thob pa'i ngo bor 'dod na ni //
analyzed: thob pa'i ngo bor 'dod na ni //
translated: is the nature of the obtainment of itself,

original: dang po'ang de lta'i dngos yin phyir //
analyzed: dang po'ang de lta'i dngos yin phyir //
translated: then since the first is also such a thing,

original: thams cad mtshungs pa nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: thams cad mtshungs pa nyid du 'gyur //
translated: all would be the same.

original: 'on te thob pa sngon gyi ni ;
analyzed: 'on te thob pa sngon gyi ni ;
translated: But if the obtainment of the former

original: / thob pa'i ngo bos bden na ni //üîΩphan tshun brten phyir gcig bden pa //
analyzed: / thob pa'i ngo bos bden na ni // phan tshun brten phyir gcig bden pa //
translated: is real in terms of the nature of the obtainment,üîΩthen since they mutually depend,

original: min pas gnyi ga der 'gyur ro //üîΩ'on te rgyu ni dag pa'i phyir //
analyzed: min pas gnyi ga der 'gyur ro // 'on te rgyu ni dag pa'i phyir //
translated: neither can be real.üîΩBut if you say that it is known

original: shes te bden pa yin zhe na //
analyzed: shes te bden pa yin zhe na //
translated: because the cause is pure,

original: de yi shes pa'ang bden pa nyid //
analyzed: de yi shes pa'ang bden pa nyid //
translated: then the cognition of that is also real,

original: de rgyu dag pa las yin te //
analyzed: de rgyu dag pa las yin te //
translated: because its cause is pure.

original: de ltar gcig la gcig brten phyir //
analyzed: de ltar gcig la gcig brten phyir //
translated: Thus, because of mutual dependence,

original: thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur //
analyzed: thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur //
translated: there would be an infinite regress.

original: smig rgyu'i chu la bag chags las //
analyzed: smig rgyu'i chu la bag chags las //
translated: But because of the latent potentialities of a mirage,

original: des na de kun de ltar zhes //
analyzed: des na de kun de ltar zhes //
translated: it is said that all of that is like that.

original: rtog pa la ni 'khrul pa min //
analyzed: rtog pa la ni 'khrul pa min //
translated: But it is not a mistake in the conceptualization.üîΩBecause of the beginningless latent potentialities,

original: thog med 'brel pa'i bag chags dang // 'brel pas sngo sogs la sogs pa //üîΩ'jug pa gang yin de la ni //
analyzed: thog med 'brel pa'i bag chags dang // 'brel pas sngo sogs la sogs pa // 'jug pa gang yin de la ni //
translated: the engagement in blue, etc.

original: de la nyes pa mthong ba med //
analyzed: de la nyes pa mthong ba med //
translated: is not seen to be faulty.

original: gal te shes pa'i bdag @62b nyid rang rig pa yin na bag chags dang 'brel par yang ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te shes pa'i bdag @62b nyid rang rig pa yin na bag chags dang 'brel par yang ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: If the nature of consciousness is reflexive awareness, how could it be related to latent potentialities?

original: gal te 'brel pa rang bzhin las //
analyzed: gal te 'brel pa rang bzhin las //
translated: If the relation were different from the nature,

original: tha dad yin na gang gis 'dzin //
analyzed: tha dad yin na gang gis 'dzin //
translated: by what would it be apprehended?

original: gal te de ni rang bzhin nyid //
analyzed: gal te de ni rang bzhin nyid //
translated: If it were the nature itself,

original: yin na ming tsam byas par 'gyur //
analyzed: yin na ming tsam byas par 'gyur //
translated: it would be a mere name.

original: gal te 'brel pa dang yul rang gi ngo bo las tha dad pa'i bdag nyid yin na /
analyzed: gal te 'brel pa dang yul rang gi ngo bo las tha dad pa'i bdag nyid yin na /
translated: If the relation were a different nature from the object,

original: de'i tshe tha dad par gyur par bzung bas rang rig pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i tshe tha dad par gyur par bzung bas rang rig pa ma yin no //
translated: then it would not be reflexive awareness, since it would be apprehended as different.

original: tha dad par 'gyur pa ma yin no zhe na ni /
analyzed: tha dad par 'gyur pa ma yin no zhe na ni /
translated: If it were not different,

original: 'o na ni 'brel pa can gnyis nyid du zad kyi 'brel pa ni med pa'i phyir 'brel pa 'dzin pa mi srid do zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ni 'brel pa can gnyis nyid du zad kyi 'brel pa ni med pa'i phyir 'brel pa 'dzin pa mi srid do zhe na /
translated: But if the two related things themselves are exhausted, then there is no relation. Therefore, it is impossible to apprehend a relation.

original: de yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: gang gi phyir /üîΩ'di ni bag chags dang 'brel par //
analyzed: gang gi phyir / 'di ni bag chags dang 'brel par //
translated: Because:

original: bde blag tu ni rtogs pa yin //
analyzed: bde blag tu ni rtogs pa yin //
translated: This is easily understood to be related to latent impressions.

original: dran pa rnam shes snga ma dang // 'brel pa nyid du rtogs par byed //
analyzed: dran pa rnam shes snga ma dang // 'brel pa nyid du rtogs par byed //
translated: Memory is understood to be related to a previous consciousness.

original: dran pa ni nye bar skye ba nyid na bdag nyid nyams su myong ba dang 'brel par rtogs par byed do //
analyzed: dran pa ni nye bar skye ba nyid na bdag nyid nyams su myong ba dang 'brel par rtogs par byed do //
translated: When memory arises, it is understood to be related to the experience of itself.

original: de'i zhen pa'i dbang gis de skad brjod do //
analyzed: de'i zhen pa'i dbang gis de skad brjod do //
translated: It is said in that way by the power of clinging to it.

original: 'o na dran pa med pa la ji ltar bag chags dang 'brel par rtogs /üîΩ'di ltar / myong ba yod na bdag gis de //
analyzed: 'o na dran pa med pa la ji ltar bag chags dang 'brel par rtogs / 'di ltar / myong ba yod na bdag gis de //
translated: But if there is no memory, how is it understood to be related to latent impressions?üîΩIn this way:

original: mthong zhes de ltar dran par 'gyur //üîΩdran pa med par bdag nyid ni //
analyzed: mthong zhes de ltar dran par 'gyur // dran pa med par bdag nyid ni //
translated: When there is experience, there is memory like this: ‚ÄúI saw that.‚ÄùüîΩWithout memory,

original: shes pa 'ga' yang yod ma yin //
analyzed: shes pa 'ga' yang yod ma yin //
translated: there is no consciousness at all of ‚ÄúI.‚Äù

original: dran pa nyid 'di mthong ngo zhes nges par rtog gi de lta ma yin na mthong ba nges par brtag par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dran pa nyid 'di mthong ngo zhes nges par rtog gi de lta ma yin na mthong ba nges par brtag par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This very memory is seen is ascertained, but if it were not so, then seeing could not be ascertained.

original: dran pa med pa'i rig pa ni mthong ba'i rjes su 'brang bar rtogs pa med de /
analyzed: dran pa med pa'i rig pa ni mthong ba'i rjes su 'brang bar rtogs pa med de /
translated: The cognition that is without memory does not realize the subsequent consciousness that follows seeing.

original: des na de bag chags dang 'brel par ji ltar rtogs she na /
analyzed: des na de bag chags dang 'brel par ji ltar rtogs she na /
translated: How then does it realize that it is connected with the latent impressions?

original: de la yang mthong ngo zhes rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la yang mthong ngo zhes rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is ascertained that it is seen.

original: de ni dran pa dang lhan cig gcig tu byas nas rtogs pa'i phyir de de lta ma yin na /
analyzed: de ni dran pa dang lhan cig gcig tu byas nas rtogs pa'i phyir de de lta ma yin na /
translated: It is realized by making memory and the cognition that is without memory into one. If it were not so,

original: tha snyad mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha snyad mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: then convention would be impossible.

original: dran par bya ba dang blta bar bya ba dag gcig tu rtogs pa yin te /
analyzed: dran par bya ba dang blta bar bya ba dag gcig tu rtogs pa yin te /
translated: The object of memory and the object of seeing are realized as one.

original: des na thams cad bag chags dang 'brel pa nyid do //
analyzed: des na thams cad bag chags dang 'brel pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore, all are connected with latent impressions.

original: 'on te mthong ba dang dran pa gcig tu rtogs pa ni 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te mthong ba dang dran pa gcig tu rtogs pa ni 'khrul pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if the realization of seeing and memory as one is mistaken,

original: ma yin te /
analyzed: ma yin te /
translated: then it is not so.

original: gnod par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnod par byed pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no fault.

original: sngon mthong ba de nyid 'dir dran no zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: sngon mthong ba de nyid 'dir dran no zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: ‚ÄúI saw it before, and now I remember it.‚Äù

original: 'di la ni gnod par byed pa med do //
analyzed: 'di la ni gnod par byed pa med do //
translated: There is no contradiction here.

original: de bas na dran pa lhan cig gcig yin no //
analyzed: de bas na dran pa lhan cig gcig yin no //
translated: Therefore, memory is simultaneous with the object.

original: 'on te sngon gyi rang bzhin ni dran pa'i rnam pas 'dzin pa ma yin na /
analyzed: 'on te sngon gyi rang bzhin ni dran pa'i rnam pas 'dzin pa ma yin na /
translated: But if the past nature is not apprehended by memory,

original: de lta yin na snga ma dang phyi ma gnyis tha dad par ji ltar rtogs /
analyzed: de lta yin na snga ma dang phyi ma gnyis tha dad par ji ltar rtogs /
translated: how can the difference between past and present be understood?

original: des na tha dad pa med pa nyid do //üîΩde ltar gyur na rig pa'i bdag @63a * //
analyzed: des na tha dad pa med pa nyid do // de ltar gyur na rig pa'i bdag @63a * //
translated: Therefore, there is no difference.

original: nyid du shin tu gsal lo //
analyzed: nyid du shin tu gsal lo //
translated: In that case, the self is clearly conscious.

original: gzhan yang / phyi'i dngos po la rgyu 'bras kyi dngos po nges par bya mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang / phyi'i dngos po la rgyu 'bras kyi dngos po nges par bya mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Moreover, the causal relation of external things cannot be ascertained.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / phyi rol sngon mthong med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: 'di ltar / phyi rol sngon mthong med pa'i phyir //
translated: Because the external thing is not seen before,

original: ji ltar rnam shes 'bras bu yin //
analyzed: ji ltar rnam shes 'bras bu yin //
translated: how can consciousness be its effect?

original: rnam shes bltar rung yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: rnam shes bltar rung yin pa'i phyir //
translated: Because consciousness is visible,

original: rnam shes 'bras bu yin par rig / de bzhin du /üîΩyul dang dus sogs gnas skabs las //
analyzed: rnam shes 'bras bu yin par rig / de bzhin du / yul dang dus sogs gnas skabs las //
translated: it is known to be the effect of consciousness.üîΩSimilarly:üîΩBecause the effect arises in a different place and time, etc.,

original: de 'bras gzhan du skye ba'i phyir //
analyzed: de 'bras gzhan du skye ba'i phyir //
translated: from the cause,

original: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i nges pa ni //
analyzed: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i nges pa ni //
translated: The order of cause and effect

original: 'thad par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: 'thad par 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: would not be tenable.

original: rig pa'i phyogs la ni /
analyzed: rig pa'i phyogs la ni /
translated: In the case of cognition,

original: rig pa sngon gyi rig pa nyid las skye'o //
analyzed: rig pa sngon gyi rig pa nyid las skye'o //
translated: cognition arises from a previous cognition.

original: gal te du ba me med par 'byung ba /
analyzed: gal te du ba me med par 'byung ba /
translated: Even if smoke were to arise without fire,

original: de lta na yang du ba'i bag chags las 'byung ba'i phyir rgyu med pa can ma yin no //
analyzed: de lta na yang du ba'i bag chags las 'byung ba'i phyir rgyu med pa can ma yin no //
translated: it would not be without a cause, because it would arise from the latent impressions of smoke.

original: chur snang ba yang ste /
analyzed: chur snang ba yang ste /
translated: It is like the appearance of water,

original: sbrang bu'i tshogs dang / smig rgyu la du ba dang chu bzhin no //
analyzed: sbrang bu'i tshogs dang / smig rgyu la du ba dang chu bzhin no //
translated: like the appearance of smoke and water in a mirage.

original: phyi rol nyid bag chags las 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: phyi rol nyid bag chags las 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that external objects arise from latent impressions,

original: phyi rol 'di ni 'dod pa yin te /
analyzed: phyi rol 'di ni 'dod pa yin te /
translated: we accept that,

original: bag chags kyi stobs las byung ba'i phyir ming tsam byas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bag chags kyi stobs las byung ba'i phyir ming tsam byas par 'gyur ro //
translated: but they would be mere names, because they arise from the power of latent impressions.

original: de yang 'jig rten nyid kyis yin pas khyed kyis skyes bu byed pa ci yod /
analyzed: de yang 'jig rten nyid kyis yin pas khyed kyis skyes bu byed pa ci yod /
translated: Since that is so in the world, what human effort is there?

original: gal te bag chags kyi 'bras bu nyid du snang ba med pa yin nam /
analyzed: gal te bag chags kyi 'bras bu nyid du snang ba med pa yin nam /
translated: If the appearance is not the result of latent impressions,

original: ji ltar bag chags kyi 'bras bu yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bag chags kyi 'bras bu yin zhe na /
translated: how is it the result of latent impressions?

original: ci du ba glo bur ba las me rtogs pa la me'i 'bras bur snang ba yod dam /
analyzed: ci du ba glo bur ba las me rtogs pa la me'i 'bras bur snang ba yod dam /
translated: In the case of the cognition of fire from the perception of smoke, is there the appearance of the effect of fire?

original: brtags pa las 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: brtags pa las 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is a matter of imputation,

original: bag chags kyi 'bras bu nyid la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: bag chags kyi 'bras bu nyid la yang mtshungs so //
translated: then the same is true of the effect of latent potentialities.

original: skye ba gzhan la sogs pa'i bag chags sad pa yang srid pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: skye ba gzhan la sogs pa'i bag chags sad pa yang srid pa'i phyir te /
translated: It is possible that the latent potentialities of other lives are awakened,

original: rgan po la byis pa'i rtsed mo rmi ba srid pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rgan po la byis pa'i rtsed mo rmi ba srid pa bzhin no //
translated: just as it is possible for an old man to dream of playing as a child.üîΩTherefore:

original: de'i phyir / skye ba gzhan la sogs par ni //
analyzed: de'i phyir / skye ba gzhan la sogs par ni //
translated: The appearance of the perception of other lives, etc.

original: mthong ba snang ba yin zhes brjod //üîΩbag chags stobs las byung ba nyid //
analyzed: mthong ba snang ba yin zhes brjod // bag chags stobs las byung ba nyid //
translated: Is said to be the appearance of the arising of latent potentialities.

original: snang ngo zhes ni rnam par nges //üîΩdes na snga ma snga ma yi //
analyzed: snang ngo zhes ni rnam par nges // des na snga ma snga ma yi //
translated: It is certain that it is an appearance arising from the power of latent potentialities.

original: rnam par shes pa snang ba yin //üîΩrnam shes las ni phyi rol pa //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa snang ba yin // rnam shes las ni phyi rol pa //
translated: Therefore, the earlier consciousness is the appearance.

original: kun du phyi rol nyid du bstan //üîΩrmi lam mthong rnams gcig la ni //
analyzed: kun du phyi rol nyid du bstan // rmi lam mthong rnams gcig la ni //
translated: The external object is taught to be external to consciousness.

original: sna tshogs su ni snang ba 'di //üîΩthog med bag chags dang 'brel bas//
analyzed: sna tshogs su ni snang ba 'di // thog med bag chags dang 'brel bas//
translated: In the case of the perception of a variety of things in a dream,

original: dbang du byas pa'i sems yin no //
analyzed: dbang du byas pa'i sems yin no //
translated: it is the mind that is the object of perception,üîΩwhich is related to beginningless latent potentialities,üîΩand which is under the influence of those latent potentialities.

original: 'bras bu yin phyir 'bras bu kun //
analyzed: 'bras bu yin phyir 'bras bu kun //
translated: Because it is the result, it is the result of all.

original: bag chags dang ni 'brel pa yin //
analyzed: bag chags dang ni 'brel pa yin //
translated: It is connected with latent tendencies.

original: rdza mkhan la sogs 'bras bu yang //
analyzed: rdza mkhan la sogs 'bras bu yang //
translated: Even the results of potters and so forth

original: rmi lam mthong ba'i 'bras bu bzhin //
analyzed: rmi lam mthong ba'i 'bras bu bzhin //
translated: are like the results of seeing dreams.

original: gtso bo dbang phyug las dang ni //
analyzed: gtso bo dbang phyug las dang ni //
translated: The principal, ƒ™≈õvara, karma,

original: gzhan yang brtags pa gang yin pa //üîΩde ni bag chags 'brel @63b pa la //
analyzed: gzhan yang brtags pa gang yin pa // de ni bag chags 'brel @63b pa la //
translated: and whatever else is imagined,üîΩthat is moved by the confused mind

original: rmongs pa'i sems kyis g-yo ba yin //
analyzed: rmongs pa'i sems kyis g-yo ba yin //
translated: connected with latent tendencies.

original: de ni gtso bo rnams kyi gtso //
analyzed: de ni gtso bo rnams kyi gtso //
translated: That is the principal of the principals,

original: de bzhin dbang phyug rnams kyi ni //
analyzed: de bzhin dbang phyug rnams kyi ni //
translated: and likewise, the ƒ™≈õvara of the ƒ™≈õvaras.

original: dbang phyug 'gro kun byed po de //
analyzed: dbang phyug 'gro kun byed po de //
translated: That ƒ™≈õvara is the creator of all migrating beings,

original: lha yi mchog ni bag chags yin //
analyzed: lha yi mchog ni bag chags yin //
translated: the supreme god is the latent tendencies.

original: de lta min na 'gro ba yi //
analyzed: de lta min na 'gro ba yi //
translated: If it were not so, then what use would it be

original: byed po rtogs pa dang ldan pa //
analyzed: byed po rtogs pa dang ldan pa //
translated: for the creator of migrating beings to have realization?üîΩHow could he engage in

original: ci rung bar ni gnas pa dang // skyo chen 'jug pa ji ltar byed //
analyzed: ci rung bar ni gnas pa dang // skyo chen 'jug pa ji ltar byed //
translated: dwelling in what is suitable and great discouragement?üîΩIf he is able to dwell with independence

original: rang dbang du gnas nus pa dang // yongs su shes pa thod thod du //
analyzed: rang dbang du gnas nus pa dang // yongs su shes pa thod thod du //
translated: and has complete knowledge,

original: gal te 'jug par byed na go / gang la gang gis bslab par bya //
analyzed: gal te 'jug par byed na go / gang la gang gis bslab par bya //
translated: if he engages, then by what and in what should he train?

original: 'di ni rang don skye ba la //
analyzed: 'di ni rang don skye ba la //
translated: This is the birth of one‚Äôs own purpose.

original: lung 'bogs byed pa nyid yin na //
analyzed: lung 'bogs byed pa nyid yin na //
translated: If you are the one who imparts the scriptures,

original: byed po rang tshul mi sdug pa //
analyzed: byed po rang tshul mi sdug pa //
translated: then you are not the creator who is the very nature of all.

original: de la rigs pa smra ba su //
analyzed: de la rigs pa smra ba su //
translated: Who would speak of you as the rational creator?

original: ci rung ba ni bsgrub byas te //
analyzed: ci rung ba ni bsgrub byas te //
translated: Whatever is to be accomplished is accomplished by the object to be accomplished.

original: gal te legs pa sgrub byed na //
analyzed: gal te legs pa sgrub byed na //
translated: If you are the one who accomplishes what is good,

original: mi gtsang 'khrul bar byed pa bas //
analyzed: mi gtsang 'khrul bar byed pa bas //
translated: then you are the one who is to be abandoned, the one who creates impurity.üîΩIt is best to keep far away from ignorance.

original: ma rig par ni bsrings pa mchog / gzhan du byed par mi nus na //
analyzed: ma rig par ni bsrings pa mchog / gzhan du byed par mi nus na //
translated: If you are not able to create anything else,

original: 'di la nus pa ji ltar 'dod //
analyzed: 'di la nus pa ji ltar 'dod //
translated: how can you be considered powerful in this regard?

original: bag chags stobs las de yang ni //
analyzed: bag chags stobs las de yang ni //
translated: That is also the case due to the power of latent propensities.

original: de las de ltar 'jug pa yin //
analyzed: de las de ltar 'jug pa yin //
translated: It functions in that way due to that.

original: de ltar gtso bo dbang phyug dang // byed po smra ba'i chu klung ni //
analyzed: de ltar gtso bo dbang phyug dang // byed po smra ba'i chu klung ni //
translated: Thus the river of the proponents of ƒ™≈õvara, the creator,

original: myur 'bab 'jug rnams chad med pa //
analyzed: myur 'bab 'jug rnams chad med pa //
translated: flows swiftly, uninterrupted,

original: bag chags rgya mcher zhugs zad 'gyur //
analyzed: bag chags rgya mcher zhugs zad 'gyur //
translated: and enters the great crocodile of latent propensities.

original: rmongs pa legs pa'i thabs rnams kyi //
analyzed: rmongs pa legs pa'i thabs rnams kyi //
translated: The latent propensities of the methods of the wiseüîΩare the supreme support.

original: bag chags nyid ni brten pa mchog / de nyid las ni 'dod pa kun //
analyzed: bag chags nyid ni brten pa mchog / de nyid las ni 'dod pa kun //
translated: From that alone all desired things

original: rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ba yin //
analyzed: rab tu 'grub par 'gyur ba yin //
translated: are accomplished.

original: de bas na ji ltar don 'dzin ces nga la 'dri bar mi bya ste de'i bsam pa mthar thug pa bstan pa'i don ni 'di yin no //
analyzed: de bas na ji ltar don 'dzin ces nga la 'dri bar mi bya ste de'i bsam pa mthar thug pa bstan pa'i don ni 'di yin no //
translated: Therefore, do not ask me, ‚ÄúHow does it apprehend objects?‚Äù The meaning of the statement of the ultimate intention is this:

original: ngas ni khyed la 'di 'dra ba rnam pa thams cad du sgrub par mi nus so //üîΩshin tu nyes par byas pa la //
analyzed: ngas ni khyed la 'di 'dra ba rnam pa thams cad du sgrub par mi nus so // shin tu nyes par byas pa la //
translated: I cannot establish this for you in any way.üîΩWho can establish

original: sgrub par nus pa su zhig yod //üîΩsa bon shin tu rul pa la //
analyzed: sgrub par nus pa su zhig yod // sa bon shin tu rul pa la //
translated: that which is very badly done?üîΩWhat can be done with a seed

original: chun pa yis ni ci zhig bya //
analyzed: chun pa yis ni ci zhig bya //
translated: that is very rotten?

original: gal te gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa'i rnam pa nyid med pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa'i rnam pa nyid med pa yin na /
translated: If the aspects of the apprehended object and apprehending subject do not exist,

original: de lta bu'i tha snyad du ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: de lta bu'i tha snyad du ji ltar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: how can there be such conventions?

original: 'di yang khyed kyi kun du rmongs pa tsam du zad do //
analyzed: 'di yang khyed kyi kun du rmongs pa tsam du zad do //
translated: This is just your confusion.

original: gzung ba la sogs pa'i tha snyad kyang rig pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: gzung ba la sogs pa'i tha snyad kyang rig pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The conventions of the apprehended object and so on are not cognition.

original: myong ba'i rang bzhin du chud pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: myong ba'i rang bzhin du chud pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are included in the nature of experience.

original: tha snyad ni de'i bdag nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tha snyad ni de'i bdag nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The convention is the nature of that. This is the meaning.üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / blo bdag rnam par dbyer med kyang //
analyzed: 'di ltar / blo bdag rnam par dbyer med kyang //
translated: The mind is not different from the self.

original: mthong ba phyin ci log rnams kyis //
analyzed: mthong ba phyin ci log rnams kyis //
translated: Those with distorted vision

original: gzung dang 'dzin pa myong ba dag / tha dad ldan bzhin rtogs par 'gyur //
analyzed: gzung dang 'dzin pa myong ba dag / tha dad ldan bzhin rtogs par 'gyur //
translated: perceive the experience of apprehended objects and apprehending subjects as being different and connected.

original: dper na dbang po sngags sogs kyis //
analyzed: dper na dbang po sngags sogs kyis //
translated: For example, for those whose sense faculties are affected by spells,

original: bslad pa rnams la 'jim du ma sogs //
analyzed: bslad pa rnams la 'jim du ma sogs //
translated: clay and so on appear as horses and elephants.

original: de yi gzugs dang bral ba yang //
analyzed: de yi gzugs dang bral ba yang //
translated: Even though they are devoid of the form of that,

original: rnam pa gzhan du snang ba @64a * //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan du snang ba @64a * //
translated: they appear in another way.

original: bzhin ; / blo bdag rnam par dbyer med kyang //
analyzed: bzhin ; / blo bdag rnam par dbyer med kyang //
translated: In the same way, although the mind and the self are not different,

original: zhes bya ba 'di ni rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis grub pa nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di ni rang rig pa'i mngon sum gyis grub pa nyid do //
translated: this is established by reflexive awareness.

original: de ltar yang bstan zin to //
analyzed: de ltar yang bstan zin to //
translated: This has already been taught.

original: mthong ba phyin ci log pa rnams kyis kyang gzung ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gzung ba ni ma yin gyi /
analyzed: mthong ba phyin ci log pa rnams kyis kyang gzung ba la sogs pa'i rang bzhin gzung ba ni ma yin gyi /
translated: Those with distorted vision do not perceive the nature of apprehended objects and so on.

original: 'on kyang rtogs pa nyid do //
analyzed: 'on kyang rtogs pa nyid do //
translated: Nevertheless, they do perceive.üîΩAlthough there is no ‚ÄúI,‚Äù others see it.

original: nga med kyang gzhan gyis mthong ba yin no zhes log par sgro btags nas de ltar tha snyad byed do /
analyzed: nga med kyang gzhan gyis mthong ba yin no zhes log par sgro btags nas de ltar tha snyad byed do /
translated: Thus, they superimpose it and make that convention.

original: 'di ltar mthong ba ni nga yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar mthong ba ni nga yin te /
translated: In this way, ‚ÄúI‚Äù am the one who sees.

original: phyi rol ni gzhan gyis mthong bar 'gyur ba nyid do zhes so //
analyzed: phyi rol ni gzhan gyis mthong bar 'gyur ba nyid do zhes so //
translated: The external is what is seen by others.

original: 'di ltar ni dpyod par mi byed de /
analyzed: 'di ltar ni dpyod par mi byed de /
translated: But this is not the way to analyze the matter.

original: gzhan gyis mthong ba gang yin pa de bdag gis ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur /
analyzed: gzhan gyis mthong ba gang yin pa de bdag gis ji ltar mthong bar 'gyur /
translated: How can what is seen by others be seen by me?

original: gzhan gyis kyang 'di ltar shes pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan gyis kyang 'di ltar shes pa ni ma yin te /
translated: Others do not know it in this way,

original: de'i de yang bdag gi myong ba bzhin du thun mong ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya bar ro //
analyzed: de'i de yang bdag gi myong ba bzhin du thun mong ma yin pa nyid do zhes bya bar ro //
translated: because it is not common to them as it is to me.

original: 'on te de yang bdag gis mthong ngo zhes rjes su dpag pa nyid las shes pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te de yang bdag gis mthong ngo zhes rjes su dpag pa nyid las shes pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if it is known through inference that it is seen by me,

original: de lta yin na phan tshun rten pa'i nyes bar 'gyur ro//
analyzed: de lta yin na phan tshun rten pa'i nyes bar 'gyur ro//
translated: then there is the fault of mutual dependence.

original: 'bras bu mthong ba las 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhe na ma yin te /üîΩgcig nyid du mi rtogs par thal ba'i phyir ro //üîΩdu ba las me shes pa na tshang ba na yod pa nyid ni shes pa ma yin no //
