analyzed: @80b dper na rmi lam nyid na rmi lam dang cig shos khyad par yod pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, even in a dream, there is a distinction between the dream and what is other than the dream.

original: yang na rmi lam gyi khyad par nyid yin la rag mod /
analyzed: yang na rmi lam gyi khyad par nyid yin la rag mod /
translated: Or, even if it is a specific feature of a dream,

original: de la yang mi mkhas pa rnam 'jug par 'gyur bas 'di khyed la chad pa ci zhog yod /
analyzed: de la yang mi mkhas pa rnam 'jug par 'gyur bas 'di khyed la chad pa ci zhog yod /
translated: what fault is there for you, since the unwise engage with it?

original: don dam pa la mkhas pa mi gtsug gi rin po che'i rgyan dam par 'gyur ba thar pa 'dod pa rnams ni bde ba thams da byis pa'i rtsed mo dang 'dra bar mngon par 'dod pa ma yin pas 'jug pa med par thal ba grub pa la sgrubüîΩpa nyid do //
analyzed: don dam pa la mkhas pa mi gtsug gi rin po che'i rgyan dam par 'gyur ba thar pa 'dod pa rnams ni bde ba thams da byis pa'i rtsed mo dang 'dra bar mngon par 'dod pa ma yin pas 'jug pa med par thal ba grub pa la sgrub pa nyid do //
translated: The ultimate is the supreme ornament of the crest-jewel of the wise. Those who desire liberation do not desire all happiness, which is like the play of a child. Therefore, it is established that they do not engage in it.

original: 'di ltar / thar 'dod bzod pa dang ldan dag //
analyzed: 'di ltar / thar 'dod bzod pa dang ldan dag //
translated: Thus, those who desire liberation and possess patience

original: 'khor ba'i bde ba don gnyer min //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i bde ba don gnyer min //
translated: do not strive for the happiness of cyclic existence.

original: des na de dag chos la ni //
analyzed: des na de dag chos la ni //
translated: Therefore, their engagement in the Dharma

original: 'jug pa de bzlog grub phyir yin //
analyzed: 'jug pa de bzlog grub phyir yin //
translated: is for the sake of reversing that.

original: 'khor ba'i bde ba'i don du chos sgrub mtha' dag byis pa'i rtsed mo dang 'dra bar mthong ba'i rtogs pa dang ldan pa thar pa 'phen pa rnams ni 'khor ba'i tha snyad 'dri ba'i chos la bzlog pa 'jug pa yin no //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i bde ba'i don du chos sgrub mtha' dag byis pa'i rtsed mo dang 'dra bar mthong ba'i rtogs pa dang ldan pa thar pa 'phen pa rnams ni 'khor ba'i tha snyad 'dri ba'i chos la bzlog pa 'jug pa yin no //
translated: Those who possess the realization that sees all Dharma practices for the sake of the happiness of cyclic existence as like the play of a child, and who aspire to liberation, engage in reversing the Dharma that is fabricated by the conventions of cyclic existence.

original: des na tha snyad pa'i tshad ma'i yul ni snang ba nyid do //
analyzed: des na tha snyad pa'i tshad ma'i yul ni snang ba nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the object of conventional valid cognition is just appearance.

original: gal te me la sogs par snang ba ni bag chags dang 'brel pa nyid yin la de 'ang rigs mthun pa'i bag chags dang 'brel pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te me la sogs par snang ba ni bag chags dang 'brel pa nyid yin la de 'ang rigs mthun pa'i bag chags dang 'brel pa yin na /
translated: If the appearance as fire, etc. is related to a latent impression, and that is related to a latent impression of a homogeneous kind,

original: 'o na ni du bar snang ba de'i bag chags nyid rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
analyzed: 'o na ni du bar snang ba de'i bag chags nyid rtogs par 'gyur gyi /
translated: then the latent impression of the appearance as smoke would be realized.

original: ji ltar me'i bag chags rtogs par byed //üîΩ'di ltar / gang gi ngo bor snang ba yis //
analyzed: ji ltar me'i bag chags rtogs par byed // 'di ltar / gang gi ngo bor snang ba yis //
translated: How could it cause the realization of the latent impression of fire?üîΩThus:üîΩThe latent impression that is applied

original: rab tu sbyar pa'i bag chags ni //üîΩde yin ngo bo snang ba yi //
analyzed: rab tu sbyar pa'i bag chags ni // de yin ngo bo snang ba yi //
translated: by the appearance of a certain natureüîΩis the cause of the appearance of that nature,

original: rgyu yin snang ba gzhan gyi min //
analyzed: rgyu yin snang ba gzhan gyi min //
translated: not of another appearance.

original: me'i bag chags kyis ni du bar snang ba skyed par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: me'i bag chags kyis ni du bar snang ba skyed par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: The latent impression of fire does not generate the appearance as smoke,

original: de'i du ba'i bag chags nyid kyis bskyed par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i du ba'i bag chags nyid kyis bskyed par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is generated by the latent impression of smoke itself.

original: de las gzhan gyis bskyed par bya bas ni skyed par byed pa ma yin pa gzhan go par byed pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de las gzhan gyis bskyed par bya bas ni skyed par byed pa ma yin pa gzhan go par byed pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is generated by something else, it is not generated by something else that is not a cause.

original: 'di la brjod pa /üîΩsems rgyud de rung bag chags kyi //
analyzed: 'di la brjod pa / sems rgyud de rung bag chags kyi //
translated: In response to this, it is said:üîΩThe continuum of mind that is suitable

original: snying po can ni du bas ni //
analyzed: snying po can ni du bas ni //
translated: is the essence of the latent impression of smoke.

original: snang ba'i blo dag gsal byed pa //
analyzed: snang ba'i blo dag gsal byed pa //
translated: The mind that is clear and pure

original: des na me las du ba yin //
analyzed: des na me las du ba yin //
translated: sees the fire and the smoke.

original: 'khor ba'i spros pa mtha' dag ni sems nyid las byung ba yin no //
analyzed: 'khor ba'i spros pa mtha' dag ni sems nyid las byung ba yin no //
translated: All the elaborations of cyclic existence arise from the mind.

original: des na mer snang rung ba'i bag chags kyi rtogs pa can gyi sems kyi rgyud las mer snang ba yin //
analyzed: des na mer snang rung ba'i bag chags kyi rtogs pa can gyi sems kyi rgyud las mer snang ba yin //
translated: Therefore, the appearance of fire arises from the mind that has the latent potentialities for the appearance of fire.

original: rgyud de yang du ba'i bag chags sad par byed pa'i sems gzhan gyis nye bar bsgrub ba las du bar snang ba skyed par bye pa yin no //üîΩde bas na me'i bag chags lhan cig byed pa tsam gyi du ba'i bag chags du par @81a * //
analyzed: rgyud de yang du ba'i bag chags sad par byed pa'i sems gzhan gyis nye bar bsgrub ba las du bar snang ba skyed par bye pa yin no // de bas na me'i bag chags lhan cig byed pa tsam gyi du ba'i bag chags du par @81a * //
translated: That mind is produced from another mind that activates the latent potentialities for smoke, and it produces the appearance of smoke.üîΩTherefore, the latent potentialities for smoke are the substantial cause of the appearance of smoke, which is merely the cooperative condition of the latent potentialities for fire.

original: snang ba'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu yin la 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i mer snang ba'i nye bar len pa'i bag chags kyang sad par byed pa yin pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: snang ba'i nye bar len pa'i rgyu yin la 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i mer snang ba'i nye bar len pa'i bag chags kyang sad par byed pa yin pa'i phyir na /
translated: And the latent potentialities for the appearance of fire are activated.

original: du bar snang ba 'am /
analyzed: du bar snang ba 'am /
translated: Therefore, the appearance of smoke

original: du ba'i bag chags kyi lhan cig byed pa can yin no //
analyzed: du ba'i bag chags kyi lhan cig byed pa can yin no //
translated: is the cooperative condition of the latent potentialities for smoke.

original: des me dang me'i 'bras bu du ba dag tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa'i phyir go bya go byed kyi dngos po yin pas na 'thad pa yin no //
analyzed: des me dang me'i 'bras bu du ba dag tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa'i phyir go bya go byed kyi dngos po yin pas na 'thad pa yin no //
translated: Because fire and its effect, smoke, are dependent on the same collection of causes, they are the entities that are the object and subject of understanding.

original: gal te tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa nyid kyis go bar byed pa yin na /
analyzed: gal te tshogs pa gcig la rag las pa nyid kyis go bar byed pa yin na /
translated: If something is the object of understanding because it is dependent on the same collection of causes,

original: go bya go byed kyi dngos po gang dus mtshungs pa yin gyi /
analyzed: go bya go byed kyi dngos po gang dus mtshungs pa yin gyi /
translated: then what are the entities that are the object and subject of understanding that are simultaneous?

original: ma 'ongs pa ni rtogs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa ni rtogs pa ma yin te /
translated: The future is not understood.

original: 'khrul pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: 'khrul pa'o zhe na /
translated: It is mistaken.

original: 'di ni rung ba ma yin te ;
analyzed: 'di ni rung ba ma yin te ;
translated: This is not correct.üîΩBecause it is established that

original: 'di ltar / thams cad du ni ma 'ongs pa //
analyzed: 'di ltar / thams cad du ni ma 'ongs pa //
translated: the future is always

original: go bya nyid ces sgrub pa yin //üîΩdu ba las kyang thob bya'i me //
analyzed: go bya nyid ces sgrub pa yin // du ba las kyang thob bya'i me //
translated: the object of understanding.

original: skad cig der go min nam ci //
analyzed: skad cig der go min nam ci //
translated: Is it not understood at that momentüîΩthat fire, which is to be obtained, exists from smoke?

original: tshad ma'i yul ni ma 'ongs ba nyid do //
analyzed: tshad ma'i yul ni ma 'ongs ba nyid do //
translated: The object of valid knowledge is the future.

original: gal te du ba las me'i de nyid kyi tshe yod do zhes rtogs kyi /
analyzed: gal te du ba las me'i de nyid kyi tshe yod do zhes rtogs kyi /
translated: If fire is understood to exist at the time of smoke,

original: phyi nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin na /
analyzed: phyi nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba ni ma yin na /
translated: and it does not occur later,

original: de'i tshe 'ga' yang tshad mar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe 'ga' yang tshad mar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: then at that time nothing would be valid knowledge.

original: de'i dus su 'byung ba'i mes ni de la dgos pa med do //
analyzed: de'i dus su 'byung ba'i mes ni de la dgos pa med do //
translated: The fire that occurs at that time has no need for it.

original: gal te 'byung bar 'gyur ba la the tshom za bar ni ji ltar tshad ma nyid yin /
analyzed: gal te 'byung bar 'gyur ba la the tshom za bar ni ji ltar tshad ma nyid yin /
translated: If one doubts that it will occur, how can it be a valid cognition?

original: des thob pa ston pa'i phyir tshad ma yin te /
analyzed: des thob pa ston pa'i phyir tshad ma yin te /
translated: It is a valid cognition because it reveals what is obtained.

original: tshad mas gnya' bo'i tshul gyis dus gzhan gyi don bstan par bya ba ni ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: tshad mas gnya' bo'i tshul gyis dus gzhan gyi don bstan par bya ba ni ma yin no zhe na /
translated: A valid cognition does not reveal an object of another time in the manner of a go-between.

original: bstan pa des nang don bya ba mi byed pa'i phyir na /
analyzed: bstan pa des nang don bya ba mi byed pa'i phyir na /
translated: But since that revelation does not perform a function,

original: de don med pa kho na ma yin nam /
analyzed: de don med pa kho na ma yin nam /
translated: isn‚Äôt it meaningless?

original: 'byung bar 'byung bas don bya ba 'byung ba'i phyir na /
analyzed: 'byung bar 'byung bas don bya ba 'byung ba'i phyir na /
translated: Since a function occurs from the occurrence of that which will occur,

original: 'di yang nye bar btags nas don bya ba byed pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di yang nye bar btags nas don bya ba byed pa yin te /
translated: this is also a function that is imputed to the object.

original: rgyu la 'bras bu btags pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: rgyu la 'bras bu btags pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: Because the effect is imputed to the cause.

original: gal te de lta na rnam par shes pa smra ba rnams kyi ltar na yang de'i dus su go bar bya ba bag chags yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: gal te de lta na rnam par shes pa smra ba rnams kyi ltar na yang de'i dus su go bar bya ba bag chags yod pa nyid do //
translated: If that is so, then according to the proponents of consciousness, the object that is understood at that time is the existence of the latent imprints.

original: don bya ba byed ba nyid med pa'i phyir des ci bya zhe na /
analyzed: don bya ba byed ba nyid med pa'i phyir des ci bya zhe na /
translated: Since it does not perform a function, what is the point of it?

original: 'di ni don la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: 'di ni don la yang mtshungs so //
translated: This is the same in fact.

original: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don gyi sgo nas don bya ba byed pa'i phyir de yang don bya ba byed pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i don gyi sgo nas don bya ba byed pa'i phyir de yang don bya ba byed pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it performs a function because it performs a function with respect to a future object,

original: 'di'i bag chags la yang mtshungs so //
analyzed: 'di'i bag chags la yang mtshungs so //
translated: then the same is true of the latent impressions.

original: don la yang de'i dus su bag chags tsam go bar bya ba yin no //
analyzed: don la yang de'i dus su bag chags tsam go bar bya ba yin no //
translated: And in fact, at that time, it is only the latent impressions that are understood.

original: gzhan gyis go ba yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan gyis go ba yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that it is understood by another,

original: bag chags kyang gzhan gyis go ba nyid do /
analyzed: bag chags kyang gzhan gyis go ba nyid do /
translated: then the latent impressions are also understood by another.

original: bag chags kyang tha snyad las gzhan gyis mi rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bag chags kyang tha snyad las gzhan gyis mi rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: And the latent impressions are not understood by anything other than verbal designation.

original: des na phyi'i don dang rnam par rig pa tsam du smra ba dag gi @81b rjes su dpag pa 'dra ba nyid do //
analyzed: des na phyi'i don dang rnam par rig pa tsam du smra ba dag gi @81b rjes su dpag pa 'dra ba nyid do //
translated: Therefore, the inferences of the proponents of external objects and of consciousness only are similar.

original: des na rnam par rig pa tsam nyid rigs so //
analyzed: des na rnam par rig pa tsam nyid rigs so //
translated: Therefore, consciousness only is reasonable.

original: 'o na ji ltar slob dpon gyis phyi'i don la yang rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gnyis par bshad de /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar slob dpon gyis phyi'i don la yang rnam par shes pa rang bzhin gnyis par bshad de /
translated: Well then, why did the master explain that consciousness has two natures with respect to external objects?

original: rnam par shes pa smra ba nyid du rigs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa smra ba nyid du rigs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: It is reasonable that consciousness is the only reality.

original: 'di la bshad pa /
analyzed: 'di la bshad pa /
translated: The explanation of this is as follows.

original: mkhas pa rnams la rtsod 'di yod //
analyzed: mkhas pa rnams la rtsod 'di yod //
translated: This is a dispute among the learned.

original: phyi rol la ni brten nas su //
analyzed: phyi rol la ni brten nas su //
translated: In dependence upon external things,

original: tshul gnyis rjod yin de yang ni //
analyzed: tshul gnyis rjod yin de yang ni //
translated: the two modes are described.

original: lhan cig myong ba nges pas 'grub //
analyzed: lhan cig myong ba nges pas 'grub //
translated: And that is established by the ascertainment of simultaneous experience.

original: gzhan la ltos te phyi'i don khas blangs nas tshul gnyis bshad pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gzhan la ltos te phyi'i don khas blangs nas tshul gnyis bshad pa yin gyi /
translated: Having accepted external things in dependence upon others, the two modes are described.

original: mkhas pa rnams la rnam par shes pa smra ba nyid do //
analyzed: mkhas pa rnams la rnam par shes pa smra ba nyid do //
translated: But for the learned, it is consciousness itself that is described.

original: tha dad pa dag ni myong ba nges pa mi rung ngo zhes bstan zin to //
analyzed: tha dad pa dag ni myong ba nges pa mi rung ngo zhes bstan zin to //
translated: It has already been explained that it is not possible for different things to be ascertained as an experience.

original: gal te rnam par shes pa rnam pa med pa nyid yin na de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te rnam par shes pa rnam pa med pa nyid yin na de'i tshe /
translated: If consciousness itself is without aspects, then

original: rnam pa gzhan nyid pas de la res 'ga' 'dzin pa'i rnam pa tha dad pa nyid du 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan nyid pas de la res 'ga' 'dzin pa'i rnam pa tha dad pa nyid du 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: because of being different aspects, it would sometimes be apprehended as having different aspects.üîΩIf the apprehension itself is the aspect of yellow, etc., then the apprehension of blue, etc. would not exist.

original: 'dzin pa nyid de ser po la sogs par med par 'dzin pa'i rnam pa nyid yin la sngon po de nyid bde ba'i rnam pa yin zhing /üîΩde nyid sdug bsngal gyi rnam pas 'dzin pa yin no zhe na //
analyzed: 'dzin pa nyid de ser po la sogs par med par 'dzin pa'i rnam pa nyid yin la sngon po de nyid bde ba'i rnam pa yin zhing / de nyid sdug bsngal gyi rnam pas 'dzin pa yin no zhe na //
translated: If the apprehension itself is the aspect of blue, etc., then the apprehension of pleasure, etc. would not exist.

original: ser sogs la yang 'dzin pa yi //
analyzed: ser sogs la yang 'dzin pa yi //
translated: If the apprehension itself is the aspect of pleasure, etc., then the apprehension of blue, etc. would not exist.

original: rnam de nyid dang sngon gang mthong //üîΩde nyid yin par shes 'di ci //
analyzed: rnam de nyid dang sngon gang mthong // de nyid yin par shes 'di ci //
translated: How can it be known that it is the same as that seen before?

original: mngon sum 'on te rjes dpag yin //
analyzed: mngon sum 'on te rjes dpag yin //
translated: Is it by perception or by inference?

original: re zhig mngon sum ni ma yin te /
analyzed: re zhig mngon sum ni ma yin te /
translated: First, it is not by perception,

original: sngon dang phyi ma'i dngos po la mngon sum gyis 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sngon dang phyi ma'i dngos po la mngon sum gyis 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because perception does not engage with past and future things.

original: de med na rjes su dpag pa la yang ma yin pas na snga ma dang phyi ma ni tshad ma'i yul ma yin no //üîΩ'o na mngon sum rjes su 'gro ldog 'dzin par nus pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de med na rjes su dpag pa la yang ma yin pas na snga ma dang phyi ma ni tshad ma'i yul ma yin no // 'o na mngon sum rjes su 'gro ldog 'dzin par nus pa ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: If it does not exist, it is not by inference either. Therefore, the past and future are not the objects of valid cognition.

original: me la sogs pa gzhan du yang rjes su dpog pa ji ltar 'gyur zhe na ma yin te /
analyzed: me la sogs pa gzhan du yang rjes su dpog pa ji ltar 'gyur zhe na ma yin te /
translated: If that is so, then how can one infer fire and so on from smoke and so forth, since perception is not able to apprehend the concomitance of the two?

original: rjes su dpag pa ni spyi'i yul can yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dzin pa'i yul gcig tu bsams nas rjes su dpog pa yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ni spyi'i yul can yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dzin pa'i yul gcig tu bsams nas rjes su dpog pa yin no //
translated: It is not so, because inference has a universal as its object. One infers in regard to a universal, thinking of it as one, even though it is not one.

original: dper na tshang bang dang gzhan gnas pa dag gcig nyid du sgro btags nas me'i de nyid 'di'o zhes gsal ba gzhan dang lhan cig bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi /
analyzed: dper na tshang bang dang gzhan gnas pa dag gcig nyid du sgro btags nas me'i de nyid 'di'o zhes gsal ba gzhan dang lhan cig bsgrub par bya ba yin gyi /
translated: For example, having imputed the kitchen and the other place to be the same, one establishes the identity of the fire in one place with the fire in the other.

original: don dam par ni gcig pa nyid ma yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: don dam par ni gcig pa nyid ma yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: But in reality they are not the same.

original: 'dir yang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa de nyid la sngon po nyid da rung du de las tha dad par yod pa nyid do zhes rgyu tha dad pa med pa khas blangs nas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dag gam /
analyzed: 'dir yang 'dzin pa'i rnam pa de nyid la sngon po nyid da rung du de las tha dad par yod pa nyid do zhes rgyu tha dad pa med pa khas blangs nas gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dag gam /
translated: In the same way, here, having accepted that the aspect of the apprehender is not a different cause from the blue, one establishes that the apprehended and the apprehender,

original: rtogs pa rang bzhin dang sngon po'i rnam pa tha dad par bsgrubs pa yin no //üîΩdes ni dngos po la tha dad pa @82a * //
analyzed: rtogs pa rang bzhin dang sngon po'i rnam pa tha dad par bsgrubs pa yin no // des ni dngos po la tha dad pa @82a * //
translated: or the nature of the cognition and the aspect of the blue, are different.

original: yod pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: yod pa ma yin gyi /
translated: This shows that difference does not exist in reality.

original: 'on kyang spyir gyi rgyud btags pa la yod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang spyir gyi rgyud btags pa la yod pa yin no //
translated: But it does exist in general in the imputed continuum.

original: der don dam par yod pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid la ltos te /
analyzed: der don dam par yod pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid la ltos te /
translated: There, existence in the ultimate sense is determined in terms of intrinsic identity.

original: lhan cig dmigs pa nges pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: lhan cig dmigs pa nges pa nyid yin no //
translated: Simultaneous observation is the ultimate criterion.

original: des na don dam par tha dad pa med pa kho na'o //
analyzed: des na don dam par tha dad pa med pa kho na'o //
translated: Therefore, ultimately, they are not different at all.

original: gang gi tshe shes pa rnam par med pa yin pa de'i tshe ni dus thams cad du dag pa de nyid yin par 'gyur gyi gsal ba dang mi gsal ba dang rnyog pa'i rang bzhin ni ma yin par 'gyur na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe shes pa rnam par med pa yin pa de'i tshe ni dus thams cad du dag pa de nyid yin par 'gyur gyi gsal ba dang mi gsal ba dang rnyog pa'i rang bzhin ni ma yin par 'gyur na /
translated: But when consciousness is devoid of aspects, then at all times it would be pure, and it would not have the nature of being clear or unclear or obscured.

original: rnam pa gzhan yang mthong ba yin no //üîΩ'di ltar / dbang po'i khyad par gyis gsal dang // mi gsal 'dren ma la sogs pa //
analyzed: rnam pa gzhan yang mthong ba yin no // 'di ltar / dbang po'i khyad par gyis gsal dang // mi gsal 'dren ma la sogs pa //
translated: But it is seen to be otherwise.üîΩThus:üîΩBecause of the difference in the sense faculties,üîΩthere is the apprehension of different appearances,

original: snang ba tha dad 'dzin pa yi //
analyzed: snang ba tha dad 'dzin pa yi //
translated: such as clarity, unclarity, and so on,

original: shes pa don gcig la dmigs so //
analyzed: shes pa don gcig la dmigs so //
translated: in consciousness that focuses on a single object.

original: ji ltar don gcig nyid la snang ba sna tshogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ji ltar don gcig nyid la snang ba sna tshogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: How can a single object have various appearances?üîΩThus:

original: 'di ltar / de don las der snang min na //
analyzed: 'di ltar / de don las der snang min na //
translated: If it does not appear as that object,

original: don gyi rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir //
analyzed: don gyi rang bzhin gcig pa'i phyir //
translated: because the nature of the object is one,

original: de yi don can nyid kun ni //
analyzed: de yi don can nyid kun ni //
translated: then all that is of that object

original: rang bzhin gcig pa nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: rang bzhin gcig pa nyid du 'gyur //
translated: would have the same nature.

original: gal te rnam pa shes pa rnam pa med pa nyid yin na /
analyzed: gal te rnam pa shes pa rnam pa med pa nyid yin na /
translated: If the aspects are not consciousness,

original: de'i tshe gzung ba'i don nyid snang bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i tshe gzung ba'i don nyid snang bar 'gyur ro //
translated: At that time, the object that is apprehended would appear.

original: de yang rnam pa gcig nyid yin te /
analyzed: de yang rnam pa gcig nyid yin te /
translated: Moreover, it is just one aspect.

original: des na snang ba tha dad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na snang ba tha dad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the appearance would not be different.

original: don gyi rnam pa du ma ma yin no zhes bstan zin to //
analyzed: don gyi rnam pa du ma ma yin no zhes bstan zin to //
translated: It has already been demonstrated that the aspect of the object is not multiple.

original: gal te don gyi rnam pa nyid yin na yang rnam pa du ma nyid du ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te don gyi rnam pa nyid yin na yang rnam pa du ma nyid du ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: Even if it were the aspect of the object, how could it be multiple?

original: shes pa'i rnam pa de yang rnam pa gcig nyid du 'gyur bar bya ba yin te /
analyzed: shes pa'i rnam pa de yang rnam pa gcig nyid du 'gyur bar bya ba yin te /
translated: That aspect of consciousness would also have to be just one aspect.

original: des na rnam pa du ma'i nyes pa de ni so na 'dug pa nyid do zhe na /
analyzed: des na rnam pa du ma'i nyes pa de ni so na 'dug pa nyid do zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the fault of multiplicity would still remain.

original: nyes pa med de 'di ltar /
analyzed: nyes pa med de 'di ltar /
translated: There is no fault, because:

original: don la brten nas 'byung 'gyur zhing //
analyzed: don la brten nas 'byung 'gyur zhing //
translated: It arises in dependence on the object,

original: de yi ngo bo rjes byed pa //
analyzed: de yi ngo bo rjes byed pa //
translated: and it conforms to its nature.

original: de ni gzhan 'ga' zhig las kyang //
analyzed: de ni gzhan 'ga' zhig las kyang //
translated: It is not different from it in any way.

original: cha 'ga' yis ni tha dad 'gyur //
analyzed: cha 'ga' yis ni tha dad 'gyur //
translated: It is not different from the object in any way.

original: de'i rnam pa nyid du skye bar 'gyur ba ni don las gzhan las kyang de'i rnam par 'gyur ba yin te /
analyzed: de'i rnam pa nyid du skye bar 'gyur ba ni don las gzhan las kyang de'i rnam par 'gyur ba yin te /
translated: It arises in the aspect of the object, but it is not different from the object in any way.

original: dper na zla ba rnam pa gcig nyid la rab rib la sogs pa'i stobs kyi rnam par 'gyur ba bzhin no //üîΩ'di ltar pha la brten nas su //
analyzed: dper na zla ba rnam pa gcig nyid la rab rib la sogs pa'i stobs kyi rnam par 'gyur ba bzhin no // 'di ltar pha la brten nas su //
translated: For example, the moon, which is a single entity, appears to be double by reason of a certain condition, such as the presence of cataracts.

original: pha de yi ni gzugs yin yang //üîΩ'ga' zhig las ni cha 'ga' yis //
analyzed: pha de yi ni gzugs yin yang // 'ga' zhig las ni cha 'ga' yis //
translated: In the same way, the son, who is similar to his father, is perceived as different from him.üîΩThe son, who is the effect, is similar to the father, the cause.

original: tha dad pa nyid dmigs pa yin //
analyzed: tha dad pa nyid dmigs pa yin //
translated: But he is perceived as different from him, by reason of a certain part.

original: pha las 'dra bas skye ba'i bu ni gzhan ma'i rnam pa mi 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: pha las 'dra bas skye ba'i bu ni gzhan ma'i rnam pa mi 'dzin pa ni ma yin no //
translated: The son, who is similar to his father, is not perceived as having the aspect of his mother.

original: dbang po khyad par gyi tha dad pa nyid ston pa ni /
analyzed: dbang po khyad par gyi tha dad pa nyid ston pa ni /
translated: The author now shows that the difference of the object is due to the difference of the sense-faculty.

original: mar me la sogs dkyil 'khor ni //
analyzed: mar me la sogs dkyil 'khor ni //
translated: The circle of light of a lamp,

original: rma bya'i mdongs kyi rnam pa can //
analyzed: rma bya'i mdongs kyi rnam pa can //
translated: having the aspect of a peacock‚Äôs tail,üîΩis seen by the diseased eye

original: sngo dang dmar dang mdangs @82b gsal ba //üîΩmig mi gsal bas mthong bar 'gyur //
analyzed: sngo dang dmar dang mdangs @82b gsal ba // mig mi gsal bas mthong bar 'gyur //
translated: as blue, yellow, red, or white.

original: rab rib kyis mig gi nus pa nyams par byed pa rnams kyis mar me la /üîΩsngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i dbye ba tha dad pa can zlum pa mdangs gsal bar mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab rib kyis mig gi nus pa nyams par byed pa rnams kyis mar me la /üîΩsngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i dbye ba tha dad pa can zlum pa mdangs gsal bar mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: Those whose eye is affected by a disease of the pupil see the circle of light of a lamp as having different aspects, blue, etc.

original: 'on te de lta bur gyur pa nyid mar me'i rang bzhin bden pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin na de'i tshe /üîΩde yi phyi rol dngos yin na //
analyzed: 'on te de lta bur gyur pa nyid mar me'i rang bzhin bden pa nyid du 'gyur ba yin na de'i tshe / de yi phyi rol dngos yin na //
translated: But if that which is so is the true nature of the lamp,üîΩthen in that case,

original: dbang po gsal ba cis nus med //üîΩmi gsal bas kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dbang po gsal ba cis nus med // mi gsal bas kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro //
translated: how could the external objectüîΩbe seen by the unclear sense faculty?

original: yang de yang mi gsal ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: yang de yang mi gsal ba nyid yin te /
translated: It is seen by the unclear sense faculty.

original: dbang po nyams pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dbang po nyams pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not that the sense faculty is impaired.üîΩBecause,

original: 'di ltar / yang dag mthong na de mthong ba //
analyzed: 'di ltar / yang dag mthong na de mthong ba //
translated: if it is seen correctly,

original: dbang po nyams pa'ang ji ltar yin //
analyzed: dbang po nyams pa'ang ji ltar yin //
translated: how could the sense faculty be impaired?

original: mi bden pa mthong ba'i phyir mthong ba nyams pa brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: mi bden pa mthong ba'i phyir mthong ba nyams pa brjod pa yin no //
translated: It is said that the sense faculty is impaired because of seeing what is not true.

original: bden pa mthong bzhin du yang nyams par rtogs na ni /
analyzed: bden pa mthong bzhin du yang nyams par rtogs na ni /
translated: If it is understood that the sense faculty is impaired while seeing what is true,

original: ka ba la sogs pa'i mthong ba mtha' dag kyang mi nyams par rtag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: ka ba la sogs pa'i mthong ba mtha' dag kyang mi nyams par rtag par 'gyur ro //
translated: then all seeing of pillars and so on would be unimpaired and would be permanent.

original: 'di ltar re zhig mthong ba'i nus pa nyams pa rang gi ngo bos ni mngon sum du rtogs par nus pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar re zhig mthong ba'i nus pa nyams pa rang gi ngo bos ni mngon sum du rtogs par nus pa ma yin te /
translated: In this way, the impairment of the capacity to see is not able to be understood by its own nature.

original: des na rjes su dpag pas brtag bar bya ba nyid do //
analyzed: des na rjes su dpag pas brtag bar bya ba nyid do //
translated: Therefore, it is to be investigated by inference.

original: nus pa ni /
analyzed: nus pa ni /
translated: As for the potential,

original: ji ltar 'bras bu mthong ba las yod par brtag par bya ba de bzhin du 'bras bu nyams pa las nyams par brtag par bya ba yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar 'bras bu mthong ba las yod par brtag par bya ba de bzhin du 'bras bu nyams pa las nyams par brtag par bya ba yin no //
translated: just as one should imagine that it exists on the basis of seeing the effect, one should imagine that it is damaged on the basis of seeing the effect damaged.

original: de'i 'bras bu yang mthong ba yin la /
analyzed: de'i 'bras bu yang mthong ba yin la /
translated: The effect of that is also seen.

original: de'ang bden pa'am mi bden pa'i /
analyzed: de'ang bden pa'am mi bden pa'i /
translated: If it is seen as true or false,

original: bden par mthong yang rtogs pa yin na ni ma nyams pa zhes bya ba med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bden par mthong yang rtogs pa yin na ni ma nyams pa zhes bya ba med par 'gyur ro //
translated: if it is seen as true, then there would be no such thing as undamaged.

original: 'on te yod pa nyid yin yang gzhan gyis bltar med pa mthong bas na /
analyzed: 'on te yod pa nyid yin yang gzhan gyis bltar med pa mthong bas na /
translated: But if it exists, but is not seen by others, then

original: dbang po nyams pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dbang po nyams pa yin no zhe na /
translated: it is seen by the damaged faculty.

original: de lta yin na /üîΩrab rib kyis sbyangs gsal ba'i mig / dbang po las 'das mthong de la //
analyzed: de lta yin na / rab rib kyis sbyangs gsal ba'i mig / dbang po las 'das mthong de la //
translated: If that were so,üîΩthen the person with clear eyes, free from cataracts,

original: gzhan gyis mthong ba'i don de yang //
analyzed: gzhan gyis mthong ba'i don de yang //
translated: would see the object that is seen by the one with damaged faculties.

original: ji lta bur na gsal ma yin //
analyzed: ji lta bur na gsal ma yin //
translated: How could that object not be clear?

original: gang zhig gzhan gyis mi mthong ba yang mthong ba de ji ltar gzhan gyis mthong ba gsal bar mi mthong /
analyzed: gang zhig gzhan gyis mi mthong ba yang mthong ba de ji ltar gzhan gyis mthong ba gsal bar mi mthong /
translated: If one sees what others do not see, then how could one not see clearly what others see?

original: de ltar ni mthong ba med do //
analyzed: de ltar ni mthong ba med do //
translated: It is not like that.

original: gang zhig gzhan gyis bltar med pa phra mo mthong ba de ni gzhan gyis bltar yod pa yongs su gsal bar mthong ba nyid du mthong ba yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig gzhan gyis bltar med pa phra mo mthong ba de ni gzhan gyis bltar yod pa yongs su gsal bar mthong ba nyid du mthong ba yin no //
translated: That which is subtle and not seen by others is seen as gross and clearly seen by others.

original: de ltar yang ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar yang ma yin te /
translated: But that is not so.

original: des na yang dag pa mthong ba nyid du mi rigs so //
analyzed: des na yang dag pa mthong ba nyid du mi rigs so //
translated: Therefore, it is not reasonable that it is seeing reality.

original: gal te yang dag pa yin pa dang / mthong bar yang 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba 'gal ba ma yin nam /
analyzed: gal te yang dag pa yin pa dang / mthong bar yang 'gyur ba yin no zhes bya ba 'gal ba ma yin nam /
translated: But is it not contradictory to say that it is reality and also that it is seeing?

original: gal te mthong ba yang dag @83a * //
analyzed: gal te mthong ba yang dag @83a * //
translated: If seeing is not reality,

original: min ; ; ji ltar yang dag yang dag nyid //
analyzed: min ; ; ji ltar yang dag yang dag nyid //
translated: how can reality be reality?

original: mthong ba las ni ma gtogs pa //
analyzed: mthong ba las ni ma gtogs pa //
translated: Apart from seeing,

original: yang dag rgyu mtshan gzhan yod min //
analyzed: yang dag rgyu mtshan gzhan yod min //
translated: there is no other cause of reality.

original: mthong ba yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes bya bar rnam par 'jog na yang dag pa zhes bya bar mad pa nyid do zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: mthong ba yang dag pa ma yin pa zhes bya bar rnam par 'jog na yang dag pa zhes bya bar mad pa nyid do zhes bya bar 'gyur te /
translated: If it is established that seeing is not reality, then it follows that what is called reality is not reality.

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is no difference.

original: mthong ba mi 'thad pa zhes bya ba ni yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: mthong ba mi 'thad pa zhes bya ba ni yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is said that seeing is not tenable, that is not so.

original: de ni legs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni legs pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not good.

original: gang gis gang gi ngo bor mthong //
analyzed: gang gis gang gi ngo bor mthong //
translated: By what and in what essence is it seen?

original: de ni da ltar nyid rtogs bya //
analyzed: de ni da ltar nyid rtogs bya //
translated: It is to be realized right now.
